title: What is Anomaly Detection in Machine Learning?
description: Anomaly detection is considered an unsupervised machine learning task because anomalies arise from conflicting or unlikely events with unknown distributions. However, the predictive performance of purely unsupervised anomaly detection often does not match the detection rates required in many tasks, and there is a need for labelled data to guide model generation.In this article, I’ll walk you through what machine learning anomaly detection is. At the end of this article, you will also get some projects based on the problem of anomaly detection to learn its practical implementation.Also, Read – Machine Learning Full Course for free.
